metadata.selection_criteria: Xoe-NovAi relevance, technical depth, authority, currency
metadata.rationale: Selected URLs provide comprehensive coverage of sovereign AI architecture, torch-free inference, and zero-trust security patterns essential for Xoe-NovAi's mission

selected_urls.title: llama.cpp: LLM Inference in Pure C/C++
selected_urls.rationale: Essential foundation for torch-free GGUF inference with Vulkan acceleration. Provides core patterns for Xoe-NovAi's high-performance local inference targeting <300ms latency.

selected_urls.title: MemTrust: A Zero-Trust Architecture for Unified AI Memory System
selected_urls.rationale: Cutting-edge zero-trust framework for AI memory management. Directly applicable to sovereign AI systems protecting sensitive RAG data flows without external trust assumptions.

selected_urls.title: Secure Multi-LLM Agentic AI and Agentification for Edge General Intelligence
selected_urls.rationale: Comprehensive zero-trust architecture for multi-agent edge AI systems. Provides patterns for sovereign, privacy-first multi-agent coordination - essential for future Xoe-NovAi agentic flows.
